headline: The final numbers on candidate attacks on Donald Trump in tonight's debate
description: Updated the previously created graphic while watching the January Dem. presidential candidate debate.

headline: The most-talked about topics in President Donald Trump’s 2020 State of the Union address
description: Created node.js web app to record how long President Trump spoke about different topics during 2020's State of the Union. The data was fed to a force-directed bubble chart I also coded.

headline: The fast spread of Amazon Ring and law enforcement partnerships
description: Used Leaflet to create an animated cluster map showing law enforcement agencies that have teamed up with Amazon Ring since its inception.

headline: Inconsistencies in Des Moines’ 62nd precinct caucus results
description: Created an interactive data table using JS under deadline pressure. Git init to deploy in 15 minutes.

headline: What the president talked about at the State of the Union, in visualizations
description: Helped create a back-end Node.js app to track topic speaking time. Coded the visualization bones.
